desc:
Pepperdine University

  • BA Economics, BA Rhetoric
  • Florence, Italy International Program
  • Washington, D.C. Congressional Internship
  • Courses in econometrics, behavioral economics, and applied mathematics

United States House of Representatives

  • Congressional Intern
  • Office of Rep. John Campbell - California 48th

Teach for America

  • Geometry and Algebra 2 Teacher, Greenville-Weston High School
  • Assoicate Pathway Coordinator, School Leadership Team
  • Discovery-based learning professional development lead

National Geographic - Ice Cream Expedition

  • Ice cream truck national tour for Nat Geo Kids
  • Led educational programs to help kids understand how to explore their local communities

Music

  • Songwriting, scoring, arranging, and composition consulting
  • Guitar/Keys for local artists, recording sessions, and church worship bands

KIPP Foundation Research & Evaluation Team

  • Data collection, cleansing, & analysis
  • Automated reporting, VBA/SQL Server
  • Analysis decks, grant proposal preparation, and presentations

KIPP Foundation Insight & Analytics Team

  • Full-stack dashboard product development (SQL, Python, Tableau, HTML)
  • Academic data analysis and automated reporting lead
  • Program evaluation, progress monitoring consulting, and internal team support
  • Led data management trainings and visualization workshops
